entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
